Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires that websites providing incarcerated individual information be searchable by the incarcerated individual's name, former name or alias
Summary: Requires that websites providing incarcerated individual information be searchable by the incarcerated individual's name, former name or alias.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring that websites providing incarcerated individual information be searchable by the incarcerated individual's name, former name or alias
